title: 3 and Out -  Schedule Thoughts, Brady/Fox Megadeal, Tua → Tyreek
itunes:title: 3 and Out -  Schedule Thoughts, Brady/Fox Megadeal, Tua → Tyreek
description:
John gives his take on the NFL schedule release, the Tom Brady broadcasting mega deal with Fox, and if Brady could eventually replace Tua in Miami if he has a subpar season.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd
